title: We’ll take it: Prime Video unveils brief sneak peek at Wheel of Time S2 at NYCC

title: Rivian recalls 12,212 EVs due to potentially loose suspension

title: The actor who claims he co-created Mortal Kombat
description: Mortal Kombat's digitized martial artists went to court for more credit in the '90s.

title: Neuroscientists unravel the mystery of why you can’t tickle yourself
description: New study shows how tickling, playfulness can address key questions about the brain.
